original_text: David returned to his palace in Jerusalem. Then he took the ten slave wives that he had left there to take care of his palace. Now he made them live in their own house, with guards to keep them safe. He gave them everything that they needed, but he did not sleep with them. They lived there on their own. They lived like widows until they died.
korean_text: 다윗이 예루살렘 본궁에 이르러 전에 머물러 왕궁을 지키게 한 후궁 열 명을 잡아 별실에 가두고 먹을 것만 주고 그들에게 관계하지 아니하니 그들이 죽는 날까지 갇혀서 생과부로 지내니라

sentences.original_text: David returned to his palace in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗은 예루살렘에 있는 자신의 궁으로 돌아왔습니다

sentences.original_text: Then he took the ten slave wives
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 열 명의 노예 아내들을 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: that he had left there to take care of his palace
Now he made them live in their own house
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그는 그들이 자신의 집에서 살게 했습니다

sentences.original_text: with guards to keep them safe
He gave them everything that they needed
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 필요한 모든 것을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: but he did not sleep with them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 그들과 함께 자지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: They lived there on their own
They lived like widows until they died
